simnibs.read_freesurfer_surface¶

simnibs.read_freesurfer_surface(fn)¶

Function to read FreeSurfer surface files, based on the read_surf.m script by Bruce Fischl

Parameters:

fn (str) – File name

Returns:

msh – Mesh structure

Return type:

Msh()
